about_the_game:
This is an important DLC of Fresh Body。

Thomas discover the island and the secret base. He was closer to the truth.
Half-face sister's memory gradually restored, Thomas and her to meet the final judgement.

Content Introduction：

  • 15 new enemies.
  • 36 new limbs.
  • Four different endings.
detailed_description:
This is an important DLC of Fresh Body。

Thomas discover the island and the secret base. He was closer to the truth.
Half-face sister's memory gradually restored, Thomas and her to meet the final judgement.

Content Introduction：

  • 15 new enemies.
  • 36 new limbs.
  • Four different endings.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory

name: Fresh Body：Judgement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory
  • Processor: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
